text: Odayagoundanpalayam is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 17 km from Gobichettipalayam and 45 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Sathyamangalam. Odayagoundanpalayam has a population of about 2027. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Odayagoundanpalayam
